name: Unlucky Door
description: This is a game where you have to guess on the correct door to proceed. Some doors have hints that help you get figure it out, some don't. You must go through 100 doors to win. For every door you guess correctly, you reach a small savepoint. If you guess wrong 3 times in a row, your savepoint gets reset and you must start all over again. To enter a door, simply click on one. To get a hint, click on the journal at the top of the screen. If you choose the wrong door, you lose, and the game will reset to the title screen.
